statements: UPDATE ad_copy_variations SET ad_copy = 'New Ad Copy 1', test_results = {'clicks': 100, 'conversions': 10} WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE ad_copy_variations SET test_results = {'clicks': 200, 'conversions': 15}, ad_copy = 'New Ad Copy 2' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE ad_copy_variations SET ad_copy = 'New Ad Copy' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE ad_copy_variations SET test_results = '{"CTR": 0.05, "Conversion Rate": 0.1}' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE ad_copy_variations SET variation_text = 'New Variation Text 1' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE ad_copy_testing_results SET test_result = '{"conversion": 5, "clicks": 100}' WHERE ad_copy_id = 2 AND variation_id = 1;
UPDATE ad_copy_testing_results SET test_result = '{"success_rate": 0.85, "engagement": "high"}', variation_id = 2 WHERE ad_copy_id = 1 AND id = 5;
UPDATE ad_copy_variations SET variation_text = 'New Promo Offer', created_at = '2022-10-20' WHERE id = 3 AND ad_copy_id = 2;
UPDATE ad_copy_variations SET ad_text = 'New Ad Text', clicks = 100 WHERE ad_id = 12345;
UPDATE reference_data SET reference_type = 'New Type', reference_value = 'Updated Value' WHERE reference_id = 98765;
UPDATE ad_copy_variations SET ad_text='New ad text 1', ad_variation='Variation 1' WHERE ad_id=1
UPDATE test_results SET test_result='Passed' WHERE test_id=3
UPDATE ad_copy_variations SET ad_copy = 'New ad copy text' WHERE ad_id = 123;
UPDATE failed_tests SET failure_reason = 'Outdated content' WHERE ad_id = 456;
UPDATE ad_copy_variations SET ad_copy = 'New Ad Copy', ad_description = 'Improved Description' WHERE ad_id = 1;
UPDATE test_results_data SET test_result = '{"success": true}' WHERE ad_id = 2;
UPDATE ad_variants SET ad_status = 'active' WHERE ad_id = 1;
UPDATE ad_variants SET ad_text = 'Limited Time Offer!' WHERE ad_id = 2;
UPDATE ad_variants SET ad_text='New ad text', ad_status='active' WHERE ad_id=1
UPDATE ad_variants SET ad_status='inactive', ad_text='Updated ad text' WHERE ad_id=2
